dict.string: if [[ ! -f "$TM_NEW_FILE" ]]; then export TM_YEAR=`date +%Y` export TM_DATE=`date +%Y-%m-%d` if [ "$TM_MY_LICENSE" = "MIT" ]; then LICENSE="templ_lic_MIT.txt" else LICENSE="" fi cat templ_header.txt "$LICENSE" templ_body.txt \ | perl -pe 's/\$\{([^}]*)\}/$ENV{$1}/g' > "$TM_NEW_FILE" fi
